documents.content: A policy update indicates enhanced coverage for advanced imaging in chronic pain cases. Riverside Medical Group reports a 22% increase in MRI utilization. Providers must now submit prior authorization forms for non-emergent scans, effective July 2023. The new protocol applies to patients aged 40-70 with documented persistent symptoms exceeding six months.

Research note from August 2023 details outcomes of pain management interventions at Horizon Care Facility. Patients receiving combined physio-cognitive therapy showed 35% better adherence compared to medication-only approaches. Notable improvement seen in demographic strata aged 55-65 with axial joint degeneration.

Claim form #CT-4882 processed for lumbar facet injection administered at Horizon Care's interventional suite. Procedure performed by Dr. Ellen Voss on 09/14/2023. Approval required supporting documentation confirming failed conservative treatments over 120 days.

Provider audit reveals 18% of interventional pain procedures at Horizon Care lack complete conservative therapy records. Compliance memo issued October 2023 mandates checklist verification for all facet joint interventions. Noncompliant cases may face reimbursement delays under new imaging policy.

Lakeview Health Journal reports on regional pain management trends. Horizon Care Facility ranks top in Northwestern states for minimally invasive interventions. Their 2023 Q3 data shows 62% of patients originate from industrial sectors with repetitive strain histories.
